title: Open Novotel Perrier
text: The Open Novotel Perrier was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament held in <a href="France">France</a> that was played between 1994 and 1998. It was an unofficial money event on the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a> and was a pairs tournament played in a combination of <a href="Four-ball%20golf">fourball</a>, <a href="foursome%20%28golf%29">foursome and greensome</a> formats.
